reference.title: Deleting a Destination Cluster Reference
reference.shortdesc: To delete an XDCR reference to a destination cluster, use the DELETE /pools/default/remoteClusters/[destination-cluster-name] HTTP method and URI.

section.title: Description
section.p: Once an XDCR reference to a destination cluster is deleted, it is no longer available for replication using XDCR.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: DELETE /pools/default/remoteClusters/remote1 HTTP/1.1 Authorization: Basic QWRtaW5pc3RyYXRvcjpwYXNzd29yZDE= User-Agent: curl/7.21.4 (universal-apple-darwin11.0) libcurl/7.21.4 OpenSSL/0.9.8r zlib/1.2.5 Host: 10.4.2.4:8091 Accept: */*

section.title: Response
section.p: If successful, Couchbase Server responds with a 200 OK response.
section.codeblock:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: Couchbase Server 2.0.0-1941-rel-community Pragma: no-cache
....
"ok"
